channel.title: Arm new identity relation with Bridges inside ACW/Whonix
channel.description:
What is the relation between Arm new identity button (press n) with the existing already saved bridges?
as i am reading it , its kinda has no effect, as arm will not produce new bridges in order to change the user identity. so its either useless relation or shadow relation which we dont know what is going on.

item.title: Arm new identity relation with Bridges inside ACW/Whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
new identity button and bridges are unrelated.

Bridges are the first hop. Similar to https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Entry_Guards#Introduction. Theyâ€™re not supposed to change during newnym.

New identity is only for the middle or exit relay.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/FAQ#New_Identity_and_Tor_Circuits

Read full topic
item.source: Arm new identity relation with Bridges inside ACW/Whonix
